alert.note: Alert for Grundy; Hardin; Marshall; Story (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 9:35PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Story, northern Marshall, southeastern Hardin and southwestern Grundy Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 935 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of State Center, or 15 miles northeast of Nevada, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and additional rainfall up to one inch. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Ponding of water on roadways, low visibilities, and rises in small streams and creeks. Locations impacted include... Marshalltown, State Center, Conrad, Zearing, Albion, Union, Liscomb, New Providence, Beaman, Whitten, Clemons, Green Mountain, St. Anthony and Marshalltown Municipal Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
